abstracts.cdata!:
This Second Agricultural Marketing
            Project is designed to 1) help improve the efficiency of the
            food marketing system through the adoption of modern
            technology and improved marketing practices, and 2) improve
            the transparency of the system and thus competition through
            a better dissemination of information on price and volume of
            products traded, and 3) consolidate the institutional
            development of FIDEC. To that end, the project will include
            a general line of credit, expansion of market information
            services, special studies, technical assistance to retailers
            and producers, and institutional development.
